{{cpp/chrono/month/title|1=operator unsigned}}
{{cpp/chrono/month/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
constexpr explicit operator unsigned() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the month value stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
The month value stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::chrono::month m{6};
    constexpr unsigned p = static_cast&lt;unsigned&gt;(m);
    constexpr unsigned q = static_cast&lt;unsigned&gt;(std::chrono::September);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "The month is: " &lt;&lt; p &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "September is: " &lt;&lt; q &lt;&lt; '\n'; 
}
|output=
The month is: 6
September is: 9
}}
